title: NA Speaker expresses profound grief over passing of Aftab Mirani
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 01 (APP): Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq has expressed deep sorrow and grief over the demise of former Federal Minister for Defence and former Chief Minister of Sindh, Aftab Shaban Mirani.

Speaker NA extended heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family and said that the late Aftab Shaban Mirani was a seasoned, visionary, and dedicated political leader who rendered valuable services for national unity, democratic stability, and the well-being of the people.

Ayaz Sadiq said that Aftab Shaban Miraniâ€™s contributions towards strengthening democracy and promoting national security and stability will always be remembered.

The Speaker said that Aftab Shaban Mirani played a commendable role in promoting democracy and public welfare.

Ayaz Sadiq prayed to Almighty Allah to elevate the ranks of the departed soul and grant strength and patience to the bereaved family to bear this irreparable loss.
